content: Would this be the place to get help regarding new installs ?

I literally built the Ubuntu 16.04 vm 9 times last night and followed the guide to a T and it failed one way or another every time. I know thats not specific just wondering if there is something simple or inherently wrong with the current guide ?
Yep! @csmandingo the instructions generally work great; can you post the errors you were getting?
i will spin up a new vm and do it now and get back with issue
thanks
Hey Tim i completed the installation with a failure. I have the install log. Should i PasteBin it ? is there anything in it i need to redact ? thanks
shouldn't need to redact anything
K done
https://paste.ee/p/89AI6
only error i am seeing is [mNotice: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Supervisor/Exec[enable supervisor]/returns: Failed to execute operation: No such file or directory[0m
or similar
Ahh, OK
I think that's fixed in Zulip 1.5 (coming out today)
is there a manual fix for it at the moment so i can get the server up and running ?
I think just try e.g. /etc/init.d/supervisor start
(There's some sort of supervisor bug we had to work around)
and re run the install ?
yep
k install complete ill move to the next step and let you know what happens
thans
thanks
also for the settings.py can i leave ALLOWED_HOSTS = [''] blank to allow all hosts for the moment ?
also this part Always fails ./manage.py send_test_email . i get error - bash: ./manage.py: No such file or directory
cant run that to test
/home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py, but that reminds me I just noticed that path was incorrectly not absolute yesterday and was meaning to fix it
bash: ./home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py: No such file or directory
nevermind
sorry
so how am i supposed to run the setup and email test as the Zulip user ? i dont have those credentials ?
su zulip
yeah it asks for a password which i did not create
Is your current user root?
yes
but the manage.py and send test email sais it should not be run as root
Changing user from root to another user using su does not ask for a password
oh
sorry your right
ha that worked
ok great moving on thanks again
Bad Request (400) when using the generated org link. what does that usually indicate ?
fixed it
i am up and running sir.
thanks again for the help
great!
would like to know about the settings.py allowed hosts question
can i allow all ?
or do i only need to allow the chat server ip / hostname only ?
surely i dont have to have ALL the users's ip's in there
You just need to put the hostname of your server there
Not of the users
copy that. also do we have the ability to rebrand it ?
is that the CSS modifications mentioned ?
When you say rebrand, what are you thinking of? Putting your company's logo in the corner, or something more extensive?
yeah replacing the Z Zulip with my info type of thing as well as the invitation emails and such
nothing as far as themes or page formatting
no need for that its laid out quite well
(that's nice to hear!)

Hi there, I am Boxin, a newbie trying to set up the dev env on my macbook. When I ran vagrant up it failed and I ran tools/provision to try again. The log I got prints:

  • pip install --no-deps --requirement /srv/zulip/requirements/py3_dev.txt
    Processing ./api
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
    File "/tmp/pip-6n6c93cm-build/setup.py", line 32, in <module>
    version=version(),
    File "/tmp/pip-6n6c93cm-build/setup.py", line 18, in version
    in_handle))
    File "/srv/zulip-venv-cache/ebd7bc7e237348ae07dc2fa6265a184603af50f4/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.4/encodings/ascii.py", line 26, in decode
    return codecs.ascii_decode(input, self.errors)[0]
    UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xc2 in position 37: ordinal not in range(128)

I did a bit of search online and realized it is something about system encoding. When I tried python >> import sys; reload(sys);getdefaultencoding()
The python console prints: "ascii" , and from the stackoverflow post I found(http://stackoverflow.com/questions/21129020/how-to-fix-unicodedecodeerror-ascii-codec-cant-decode-byte) , i am supposed to change the system encoding by sys.setdefaultencoding("utf8"). So I am wondering should I process to make some modification to pass the error message. If so, where would you advise me to add the sys.setdefaultencoding("utf8"). Thx in advance.(and please take you time to reply as it is 2am in asia and I need to sleep already :) )
Hey, welcome! Thanks for the detailed debugging information
It does seem like we have dependencies that basically require the UTF-8 encoding
For this problems specifically, I think maybe we could setPYTHONIOENCODING="UTF-8" inprovision`, assuming you're using provision?

I guess I'd also be interested in whether this commit fixes the problem for you (assumes you're using Vagrant):
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/2395/commits/51fdfda7860d98691e6f66586777773a8535a692
